languages.text: "Я помню вкус боли. И ее запах. И цвет боли тоже помню..."

traits.locale_text: "Я помню вкус боли. И ее запах. И цвет боли тоже помню..."

languages.text: "I remember the taste of pain. And the smell of pain. And the colour of pain, too..."
languages.original_text: "Я помню вкус боли. И ее запах. И цвет боли тоже помню..."

traits.locale_text: "I remember the taste of pain. And its smell. And the colour of pain, too..."
"I remember the taste of pain. And its smell. And the colour of pain, too..."
"I remember the taste of pain. And the smell of pain. And the colour of pain, too..."
"I remember the taste of pain. And the smell of pain. And the colour of pain, too..."
"I remember the taste of pain. And the smell of pain. And the colour of pain, too..."

languages.text: «Recuerdo el sabor del dolor. Y el olor del dolor. Y el color del dolor, también...».
languages.original_text: "I remember the taste of pain. And the smell of pain. And the colour of pain, too..."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerdo el sabor del dolor. Y el olor del dolor. Y el color del dolor, también...».

languages.text: 「私は痛みの味を覚えている。痛みの匂いも。痛みの色も…」
languages.original_text: "I remember the taste of pain. And the smell of pain. And the colour of pain, too..."

traits.locale_text: 「私は痛みの味を覚えている。痛みの匂いも。痛みの色も…」

languages.text: “我记得痛苦尝起来的滋味，还有它闻起来的气味，还有它的颜色……”
languages.original_text: "I remember the taste of pain. And the smell of pain. And the colour of pain, too..."

traits.locale_text: “我记得痛苦尝起来的滋味，还有它闻起来的气味，还有它的颜色……”

languages.text: « Je me souviens du goût de la douleur. Et de l'odeur de la douleur. Et de la couleur de la douleur, aussi... »
languages.original_text: "I remember the taste of pain. And the smell of pain. And the colour of pain, too..."

traits.locale_text: « Je me souviens du goût de la douleur. Et de l'odeur de la douleur. Et de la couleur de la douleur, aussi... »

languages.text: "Ich erinnere mich an den Geschmack von Schmerz. Und den Geruch von Schmerz. Und auch an die Farbe von Schmerz ..."
languages.original_text: "I remember the taste of pain. And the smell of pain. And the colour of pain, too..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erinnere mich an den Geschmack von Schmerz. Und den Geruch von Schmerz. Und auch an die Farbe von Schmerz ..."

languages.text: "Acının tadını hatırlıyorum. Acının kokusunu hatırlıyorum. Acının rengini de hatırlıyorum..."
languages.original_text: "I remember the taste of pain. And the smell of pain. And the colour of pain, too..."

traits.locale_text: "Acının tadını hatırlıyorum. Acının kokusunu hatırlıyorum. Acının rengini de hatırlıyorum..."
